title: Google\Cloud\BigQuery\DataTransfer\V1\ImportedDataInfo\TableDefinition
name: TableDefinition
description:
External table definition. These tables can be referenced with 'name' in the query and can be read just like any other table.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.bigquery.datatransfer.v1.ImportedDataInfo.TableDefinition

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.table_id
params.description: BigQuery table_id (required). This will be used to reference this table in the query.

params.name: data.source_uris
params.description: URIs for the data to be imported. All URIs must be from the same storage system.

params.name: data.format
params.description: Describes the format of the data in source_uri.

params.name: data.max_bad_records
params.description: Specify the maximum number of bad records that can be ignored. If bad records exceed this threshold the query is aborted.

params.name: data.encoding
params.description: Character encoding of the input when applicable (CSV, JSON). Defaults to UTF8.

params.name: data.schema
params.description: Optional schema for the data. When not specified for JSON and CSV formats we will try to detect it automatically.

params.name: data.ignore_unknown_values
params.description: Indicates if extra values that are not represented in the table schema is allowed.
